description.value:
Eyepieces designed to magnify objects and help identify patterns and data, as well as record it to a data-slate. Provides +10 to Literacy, Lore, and Search Tests involving the close examination of an object. Requires full concentration whilst using it this way. Failing by 4+ DoF on these tests whilst using the item causes 1 Fatigue as the troublesome machine spirit causes feedback.

Effect: Scarce

Notes: 250 T
